• home

Microblading Cape Town: Get Perfect Eyebrows without Being a Makeup Artist

You’re done with having to pencil your brows every morning. You want a natural-looking brow that appears as though it was naturally yours.

Imagine waking up and not having to worry about drawing in your eyebrows anymore! With microblading, you can wake up with the most beautiful natural-looking brows that will last for years. It’s an affordable procedure that lasts longer than traditional tattooing techniques, so you’ll never have to worry about filling them in again!

Microblading is a semi-permanent cosmetic procedure used by many women who are unsatisfied with their eyebrow shape or color. The results look completely natural and last 18 to 30 months without any touchups needed!

Book Your procedure

What is microblading and how does it work?

Microblading is a form of cosmetic tattooing with the intention to mimic makeup. It’s a semi-permanent procedure that involves using a fine blade to deposit pigment into the skin. The results are natural-looking, hair-like strokes that can fill in sparse brows or reshape them completely!

The microblading procedure is quick and relatively painless. Numbing cream is applied to the brow area before the brow specialist begins. The numbing cream helps to minimize any discomfort you may feel during the procedure.

After numbing cream is applied, the brow specialist will use a fine blade to create hair-like strokes in your brow area. The blades are so fine that they create a natural-looking effect. Pigment is then deposited into the skin using the blade. The technician will match the pigment to your natural hair colour so that it looks completely natural.

Book Your procedure

The benefits of microblading

  • You'll never have to worry about filling in your eyebrows again!
  • Microblading is a quick and relatively painless procedure.
  • The results look completely natural.
  • Pigment is matched to your natural hair colour so that the results look completely natural!
  • Touchups may be needed now and then to maintain the results, but you will never have to worry about drawing them on again!
Book Your procedure

How Does the Microblading Procedure Work at Blink Beauty Salon?

Before Treatment

A thorough consultation starts our appointment to understand your unique requirements, style, colour and lifestyle factors.  This helps determine our custom made design for each client.

We proceed to map and design brows to compliment your beautiful facial features, show you the design to approve.  This step includes asking you to make different facial expressions, such as smiling or laughing.

Our goal is to create beautiful brows that compliments your facial features; finding the perfect colour and shape for just your face is what we do best as experts in the field.

A strong anaesthetic is applied on the area to numb the skin and ensure that the procedure is comfortable.

During Treatment

After the numbing is complete, the microblading will begin. The brow specialist will use a handheld tool to make fine, hair-like strokes in the brow area. The blades are so fine that they create a natural-looking effect. Finally, the pigment is deposited into the skin using the blade. The brow expert will match the pigment to your natural hair colour.

Most clients describe the procedure as a vibration/brow massage, and actually fall asleep.

After Treatment

Now Congrats! You are one step closer to having the perfect eyebrows. The next step is aftercare, which is very important for the success of your microblading treatment. We will go over all the aftercare instructions with you before you leave our salon so that you know exactly what to do.

6 Weeks Touchup

A touchup appointment is schedule for you in salon after your initial appointment.  The touchup appointment is important to evaluate the healing process, perfect some small gaps or adjust small areas if required. 

After your touchup appointment, you’ll have beautiful lasting brows.

Microblading lasts 12 to 18 months, and varies client to client.  You are welcome to book your annual colour boost appointment to ensure you have beautiful colour and gorgeous brows all year around.

Book Your procedure

Why Blink Beauty Salon for Your Microblading Treatment?

We are the best rated salon in Cape Town, South Africa, we are proud to offer the latest permanent makeup treatments, including microblading. Our highly trained and experienced brow experts will work with you to create the perfect brows for your face.

We only use the highest quality pigment and tools to ensure the best results for our clients.

We are know for our individualistic styles for each client that are natural, soft and feminine.  Clients feel pampered, taken care of and rejuvenated after their treatments at Blink. 

At Blink Beauty Salon, your satisfaction is our top priority.

We look forward to being part of your brow transformation.

Book Your procedure

Book Your procedure

Microblading before and after

Book Your procedure

What does microblading cost?

  • MIcroblading (90 minutes) R3 000
  • Microblading follow-up (45 minutes) R1 100
Book Your procedure

Frequently asked question about microblading

What is microblading?

Microblading is a form of cosmetic tattoo with the aim to mimic hair strokes. It's a semi-permanent procedure that involves using a fine blade to deposit pigment into the skin. The results are natural-looking, hair-like strokes that can fill in sparse brows or reshape them completely!

How long does microblading last?

Microblading is a type of tattooing that uses a needle to deposit pigment beneath your skin to produce well-defined, natural-looking brows. Depending on your skin type, activity level, and how frequently you require touch-ups, the outcomes can last from 12 to 18 months.

What is the downside of microblading?

Microblading is not suitable for all skin types. Mostly not for oily or mature skin, or those who have large pores.

In some cases, microblading might cause scar tissue.

We recommend Powder Brows to clients as it is safe for all skin types including oily skin, mature skin and large pores.

Do microblading eyebrows hurt?

We use very strong anaesthetics to ensure the ultimate comfort of clients.  Most clients describe the procedure as a tickling or scratching sensation without any pain. 

Is microblading better than a tattoo?

Microblading & Powder Brows are the two most used techniques to create beautiful brows.

Microblading uses a manual tool and Powder Brows an electronic tool.

Microblading looks like fine hair strokes and Powder Brows look like soft powder on the brows.

Microblading lasts 12 to 18 months whereafter Powder Brows last 3 to 5 years.

Microblading is not safe for all skin types, Powder Brows are safe for all skin types.

Book your brow appointment with Blink, and we will provide you with an expert opinion on what will best match your unique style.

Does microblading look fake?

No, when done correctly, microblading provides a very natural look. The goal is to create the illusion of fuller brows, not to produce a "fake" look.

How do you shower after microblading?

How do you shower after microblading? Do not put any water, lotion, soap, or makeup on your brow area during the first seven days after the procedure. Please carefully wash around the brow without getting water on the treated area while showering. Keep your face away from the shower head when taking a bath or using a shower.

Can you remove microblading?

Although less common, some people opt to get microblading removed with saline-removal or laser-removal.   Saline-removal process opens the skin and allows a concentrated salt solution to enter the top layer of skin, which then draws out the pigment. Laser-removal is the process to blast the pigment and remove for the brow region. Both removal methods should only be done by highly qualified experts

Do you still have to pluck after microblading?

In some cases you may have some extra hair outside of the brow design.  We recommend to wax, tweeze or thread the excess hair outside of the brow design to fully benefit from your beautiful designer eyebrows.

How many times can you Microblade your eyebrows?

You should expect some fading in one year, but your microblading will not be completely gone. Your microblading will be nearly unnoticeable after three years. However, regular touch-ups every 12 to 18 months can keep your microbladed brows looking natural for years.

How do I choose my design?

Our brow experts do a custom design for each client to enhance their natural facial features.  Blink Beauty Salon Brow designs include professional mapping, consideration of personality, personal preference, age, skin type, lifestyle factors and type of look.

Rest assured, you will have a perfect looking brow design to enhance your natural features.

Leave it to us as the experts at Blink Beauty Salon.

What are the age requirements for Microblading

You can do microblading from age 18.  We have done microblading on clients over 70 as well. 

There is no age limit as long as you are in good health and your health practitioner did not advise against any cosmetic procedures.
